## Bio

John Proefrock is a Master's student in the School of Aquatic and Fishery Sciences at the University of Washington, Seattle. He is a member of the Molecular Ecology Research Laboratory (MERLab), where he researches population genetics and behavorial ecology of surf smelt (*Hypomesus pretiosus*). His research interests include conservation genetics and the use of genetic data in ecological modeling.
